summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HWH Player Advantage™ basketball recruiting platform. Tested public intake form with 9 steps, admin login page, and backend API health endpoints. Frontend UI components render correctly with proper branding and navigation.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 Internal Server Error when submitting intake form
critical_bugs.root_cause: Database not configured - Supabase credentials missing

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 Internal Server Error for admin login attempts
critical_bugs.root_cause: Database not configured - Supabase credentials missing

integration_issues.issue: Form cannot complete submission due to backend database errors
Login attempts fail due to backend database connection issues

passed_tests: Backend API health endpoints (/api/ and /api/health) return 200 OK
Public intake form renders at /intake with all 9 steps visible
Step navigation works with Previous/Next buttons
Form validation prevents progression without required fields
Admin login page renders at /admin/login with proper branding
All form elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Brand colors (#0134bd blue, #fb6c1d orange) are correctly implemented
HWH Player Advantage™ branding is consistent across pages
Toast notifications work for form validation and login errors
Responsive design elements are properly implemented
action_item_for_main_agent: Configure Supabase database credentials in backend/.env file. The DATABASE_URL currently has placeholder 'YOUR_PASSWORD_HERE' which needs to be replaced with actual Supabase password. This is blocking all database operations including intake form submissions and admin authentication.

success_percentage.backend: 22% (2/9 endpoints working - health checks pass, database operations fail)
success_percentage.frontend: 90% (UI renders correctly, navigation works, only backend integration fails)
